title: Sell Wine Collection
metaDescription: Sell your wine collection or cellar to Proof Cellars. We buy estate liquidations, cellar buyouts, and large collections. Direct offers.
heroSubhead: We buy wine collections and full cellars directly - estate liquidations and cellar buyouts.
introParagraph: Whether you are liquidating an estate, downsizing a cellar, or selling a collection you have built over years, we provide direct offers for wine collections of all sizes. We handle the evaluation, logistics, and payment - no consignment, no auction fees, no waiting.
whatWeDoNotBuy: Wines with significant damage or spoilage
Items we cannot legally purchase in your state
photoChecklist: Inventory list with producer, vintage, and quantity
Photos of representative bottles showing condition
Photos of storage conditions (cellar, wine fridge)
conditionFactors: Original wood cases add value throughout
Label and capsule condition across the collection
Fill levels appropriate to wine ages
pricingFactors: Quality and reputation of producers in the collection

faqs.question: How do I sell a full wine cellar?
faqs.answer: Start by sending an inventory list with as much detail as possible - producer, vintage, quantity, and format. We will review and provide a preliminary offer, then refine after seeing photos or inspecting in person.

faqs.question: Do you buy estate liquidations?
faqs.answer: Yes. We work with estates, executors, and families to purchase wine collections. We understand the process requires sensitivity and clear communication.

faqs.question: How do you evaluate a large collection?
faqs.answer: We review the inventory, assess storage conditions and provenance, and research current market values. For large collections, we may arrange an in-person inspection.

faqs.question: What information do you need to start?
faqs.answer: An inventory list is the starting point. Include producer names, vintages, quantities, and formats. Photos of storage conditions and representative bottles help us move quickly.

faqs.question: How long does the process take?
faqs.answer: Initial offers for collections typically come within two to three business days. Larger cellars may require additional time for thorough evaluation.

faqs.question: Do you handle shipping for large collections?
faqs.answer: We coordinate logistics for collections. After agreeing on terms, we will discuss pickup, shipping, or delivery options based on the collection size and location.

faqs.question: What if my collection is mixed quality?
faqs.answer: We can evaluate mixed collections. We may offer on the valuable portions even if some wines do not meet our criteria.

faqs.question: Is my collection information confidential?
faqs.answer: Yes. We keep all seller information private and do not publish collection details.
